hackathon-description-text: Codestellation, the Friendly Hackathon is Brandeis University's premier hacking event!  Join us Oct 15-16 2016 for a weekend of building!
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=415 South St, Waltham, MA 02453, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: All attendees must be first time hackers
Doesn't have to be useful, just cool or novel.
Which hack was really cool?  Who had a neat idea?  Any web app/ mobile app can qualify for this prize.

hackathon-description-header: The Friendly Hackathon at Brandeis University
